item.title: Open Source
item.description:
üöÄ Stacked PR Sync

My first npm package! A simple tool to sync stacked pull requests with smart conflict detection.

  • Published on npm: stacked-pr-sync
  • Features: Smart conflict detection, auto-stash, branch status reporting
  • Tech: Node.js, Git automation, CLI tools

Perfect for teams working with stacked pull requests - automatically syncs branches in sequence and stops on conflicts for manual resolution.

item.title: Side Quests for a Better World
item.description:
DineMidway

Website: dinemidway.com

Planning dinner with friends often turned into endless back-and-forth ‚Äî someone suggests a spot, someone else says it’s too far, and the group chat drags on.

I built DineMidway to make this easier. It finds places that keep travel fair by balancing distance, ratings/reviews, and filters you set. The goal: nobody feels stuck with the longest drive, and plans actually move forward. üöó‚ú®
